post.author: somebody
post.content:
What you've just said seems too broad to answer.  It is just like saying \\"I need to learn cooking.  How do I do that?\\"  You need to specify what you need and how you are going to use the skill at your work.  Remember that there is no easy or fast way to learn anything.  Even though I have  been working on Cisco, Olicom (no longer available, though), Ascend, and numerous server operating systems for more than 10 years, what I know is just a fraction of the whole networking technology.  Just for an educated guess, you seem to be setting up a small network with a server and a few workstations.

>안녕하세요. 저는 토론토에 살고있는
>교민입니다.  다름이 아니고, 지금 다니고
>있는 회사일 관계로 net work 를 가능하면
>빠른 시일내에 배우려고 합니다.
>좋은 학원 이나, 개인교습을 받고 싶습니다.
>좀 알려주시면 감사하겠습니다.
>참고로, 수강료는 컴퍼니 첵크를 받을수 있어야
>합니다.  감사합니다.
post.title: [re] Net work 을 좀 배우고 싶습니다.
